output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF (CMF 11240017) - Yes, this clearly indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate - Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" as presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population - Yes, it's a paid Facebook/Instagram ad targeting 100,001-500,000 people 4. Electoral objective - Yes, explicitly asks for votes using phrases like "Susține-ne duminica aceasta, votând Marcel Ciolacu președinte!" 5. Journalism - No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion - No, this is structured campaign messaging with clear call to action for voting
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It continues electoral propaganda for the presidential election after the campaign period ended - It explicitly calls for voting for Marcel Ciolacu as president - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Contains official campaign messaging (CMF number) - Has significant spend (100-199 RON) and reach (10,000-14,999 impressions)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct call to vote for specific candidate - Paid distribution - Large audience reach - Official campaign messaging - Explicit electoral purpose
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU dupa incheierea campaniei electorale. Postarea cu ID-ul 386986527742462 contine indemnuri directe la vot ("Susține-ne duminica aceasta, votând Marcel Ciolacu președinte!"), fiind o reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un buget intre 100-199 RON si o audienta estimata intre 100,001-500,000 persoane. Postarea include numarul oficial de campanie CMF 11240017, confirmand natura sa de propaganda electorala. Aceasta activitate continua dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
